title: Competitive Research - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Miriam Ellis April 8, 2019 How to Find Your True Local Competitors Local SEO | Search Engines | Competitive Research Who are your clients’ true competitors if every SERP is a local SERP these days? We'll help you answer that question. Read this post By: Roger MozBot March 20, 2019 Win That Pitch: How SEO Agencies Can Land New Business Keyword Research | Competitive Research | Branding Learn how a flexible SERP tracking solution like STAT can snag you all sorts of new business. Read this post By: Roger MozBot February 25, 2019 We Dipped Our Toes Into Double Featured Snippets Competitive Research | Search Engines | Advanced SEO Double-snippet SERPs started trickling in last year, so we took a peek at what they’re up to. Read this post By: Roger MozBot February 20, 2019 Make Sense of Your Data with These Essential Keyword Segments Competitive Research | Advanced SEO | Keyword Research Knowing what to segment can feel daunting, especially when you’re working with thousands of keywords. That’s why we’re arming you with a handful of must-have tags. Read this post By: Roger MozBot January 24, 2019 Mapping the Overlap of SERP Feature Suggestions Search Engines | Advanced SEO | Competitive Research We explored the search suggestions packed into SERP features to see how much overlap might exist as a result of Google's endless topical organization. Read this post By: Greg Elfrink March 28, 2018 Just How Much is Your Website Worth, Anyhow? An Easy Guide to Valuation Competitive Research | Marketing Industry What goes into valuing a website? If you've ever considered selling your online business, you've likely wondered how much it's worth. This post lays the foundation for what you'll need to know to prepare your selling timeline, build value, make smart cost-cutting decisions, and move forward with the process. Read this post By: Zee Hoffmann Jones October 2, 2017 The SEO Competitive Analysis Checklist Competitive Research | Advanced SEO This comprehensive competitive analysis guide & checklist will help you ID areas of opportunity and expose niches where your site can beat your competition, without having to guess which “best practice” you should test next. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin April 7, 2017 How to Use Your Competition's "Top Pages" Data to Bolster Your SEO Efforts Whiteboard Friday | Advanced SEO | Competitive Research By comparing top pages data from multiple sources against one another, you can get some really cool, powerful advanced SEO opportunities in your content and keyword targeting. Rand explains how in this Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Wei Leen Ng June 2, 2016 Is Quora Skirting the Edge of ‘Spammy’ When it Comes to SEO? Technical SEO | Competitive Research While Google says all spam is treated equally, taking a deep, hard look at Quora made this author wonder if that's really the case. Read this post By: Jo Cameron April 6, 2016 Be Your Site's Hero: An Audit Manifesto – Next Level Advanced SEO | SEO Basics | Competitive Research SEO comes with a lot of "whys" that can be difficult to answer. Jo Cameron is here to remove some of the mystery and level up your site audit skills with the help of ace tips, Bonnie Tyler, and a hefty toolkit in the newest installment of our Next Level educational series! Read this post By: Craig Bradshaw March 30, 2016 Here's How to Supercharge Your Competitive Research Using a URL Profiler and Fusion Tables Link Building | SEO Reporting | Competitive Research Competitive analyses usually mean sifting through a ton of data. Craig Bradshaw's here to share an 8-step process that combines free data collection tools, fusion tables, and network graphs to take care of the heavy lifting when doing competitive research. Read this post By: Tom Coad March 24, 2016 The Brand Halo Effect: Does Brand Awareness Impact Organic Search Rankings? Advanced SEO | Search Engines | Competitive Research How much weight does brand carry in the SERPs? It might be more than you think. Read this post By: John Doherty March 9, 2016 Where & How do Top Startups Get Their Links? Link Building | Competitive Research Do the top startups build links? If they're getting traction, SEO is super important to their livelihood and future fundraising and revenue. So how are the top startups getting links, and how do their link counts change over time? Read this post By: Rand Fishkin February 12, 2016 How to Optimize for Competitors' Branded Keywords Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday | Competitive Research It's probably crossed your mind before. ​Should​ you optimize for your competitors' branded keywords? How would you even go about it effectively? Well, in today's Whiteboard Friday, Rand explains some carefully strategic and smart ways to optimize for the keywords of a competitor, from determining their worthiness to properly targeting your funnel to using third-party hosted content for maximum amplification. Read this post
